full_summary:
### Lake Sediment Sample Survey
***

**Reference Number:** cb-821-66544592
**Contracting Authority:** Natural Resources Canada
**Notice Type:** RFP
**Publication Date:** 2024-01-17
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-02-27T14:00:00
**Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-07-01
**Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-09-30

**Summary:** This request for proposals (RFP) invites bidders to undertake a mapping and assessment project under the GEM-GeoNorth program to increase geologic knowledge for future natural resource exploration, land use planning, conservation, and responsible resource development. The project aims to collect centre-lake bottom sediment and near-surface water samples from an area of approximately 18,000 km2 to provide baseline geochemical data for mineral exploration and environmental studies.

**Procurement Details:**

* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and others.
* **Regions of Opportunity:** None specified
* **Regions of Delivery:** None specified

**Documents:**

* Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Question and Answer (QA) documents
* Request for Quotation (RFQ) documents
* Miscellaneous attachments (available via the link below)

**Contact Information:**

* [Brenda Harlow](mailto:Brenda.Harlow@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca)
* Phone: (999) 999-9999

**Important Links:**

* Request for Proposal (RFP) documents: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29709/nrcan-5000077955-qa-qr-3.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29709/nrcan-5000077955-qa-qr-3.pdf)
* Other attachments: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29709/2024-rankin-inlet-lake-targets--not-final.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29709/2024
